DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find negative thought effect pain experience labor labor progress . Other study show woman experience intense pain early stage labor high risk complication . The investigator want know negative thought predict outcome .
DOC.brief_title: The Physical Effects Pain Catastrophizing Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects complete questionnaire three timepoints : prenatal period , within 24-48 hour give birth , 4-8 week postpartum . The questionnaire measure pain catastrophizing , depression , maternal support , support control birth , childbirth satisfaction . Chart review follow delivery record data length labor , medication use , need augmentation surgical delivery , complication .
DOC.criteria: At least 20 week pregnancy Nulliparous Singleton pregnancy Low risk pregnancy Primiparous multiparous woman Women request cesarean delivery Women pregnant twin Women plan induction Women deliver 37 week Women enrol `` Centering Pregnancy '' program Family Birth Center High risk pregnancy Severe mental illness impairs cognition function Suicidal ideation Women speak English Spanish
